analysis.key_quote: I absolutely and unequivocally object to any plan that opens the door for NIH directors, program officers, or other staff (e.g. SROs) to be political appointees.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by expressing concern that it would lead to politicization of positions within the NIH, which would compromise scientific integrity and quality. This aligns with the themes of politicization concerns and scientific integrity.
